article_title: Mark Your Calendar: Vineland job fair offers work at group homes
article_text:
The Elwyn New Jersey job fair will be at the organization’s main campus, 1667 E. Landis Ave., Vineland, from 8:30 a.m. to noon and 4:30 to 6 p.m. Candidates must have experience working with individuals with disabilities, and a high school diploma or GED. Onsite interviews may last about two hours. For more information, call Lori Haines at 856-794-5279.

The Greater Atlantic City Chamber networking mixer will be held from 5 to 7 p.m. Jan. 13 at McCullough’s Emerald Golf Links, 3016 Ocean Heights Ave., Egg Harbor Township. Online registration is required at acchamber.com. Members are free with online regisration. The cost for non-members is $10. For more information, call 609-345-1666.

og.description: Elwyn New Jersey will host a job fair Tuesday at the company’s main campus in Vineland.
